channel.title: Markus Schulz: Global DJ Broadcast
channel.itunes:author: Markus Schulz
channel.description: Now in its fifth year Schulz’s GDJB has continued to be a beacon for an always-growing throng of trance & progressive dance fans. Broadcast through leading station DI.fm and Sirius/XM satellite, the Global DJ Broadcast site and 50+ other FM stations around the planet, it has become every bit required listening for the EDM-savvy. Based on a regular format, the first show of each month is a two hour long mix from one of Schulz’s rolling World Tour gigs – ones that have of late included Medellin, Columbia, St Petersburg, Russia & Amnesia in Ibiza. Subsequent shows in the month feature Markus mixing his broad-span pick of the current electronic dance music best for an hour (which includes the forum-voted Global Selection track of the week) followed by guest mixes from both established and up-and-coming DJs.

item.title: GDJB Dec 19 2013 Podcast Edition - Markus Schulz World Tour Best of 2013 Tomorrowland
item.itunes:author: Markus Schulz
item.description: Global DJ Broadcast (December 19, 2013) - World Tour Best of 2013: Tomorrowland Markus Schulz (Recorded Live from Tomorrowland at Boom in Belgium - July 26th 2013) 01. Dada Life - Bass Don't Cry 02. Orjan Nilsen - Violetta 03. Skytech - The Other Side 04. Arty - Hope 05. Markus Schulz - Remember This 06. Max Graham - The Evil ID 07. Mr. Pit - Catch Me (Club Mix) 08. M.I.K.E. - Before Dawn 09. Rex Mundi - Aureolo 10. Beat Service - Aurora 11. Armin van Buuren - Pulsar 12. Ferry Corsten & Markus Schulz - Stella 13. Digital X - Raptor 14. Danilo Ercole - Cruzer 15. Solarstone - Solarcoaster (Markus Schulz Coldharbour Remix) 16. Cosmic Gate - Fire Wire (Cosmic Gate's Back 2 the Future Dub) 17. M.I.K.E. presents Push - Universal Nation (Orjan Nilsen Remix) 18. Yanou featuring Liz - King of My Castle (Sander van Doorn Dub Mix) 19. Age of Love - The Age of Love (Koen Groeneveld Remix vs. Wippenberg Remix / Markus Schulz Edit) 20. Marco V - Simulated (2006 Mix) 21. Veracocha - Carte Blanche (Cosmic Gate Remix) 22. Rank 1 - Breathing (Markus Schulz Coldharbour Remix) 23. Tilt - Children (Tilt's Courtyard Mix) 24. Markus Schulz & Elevation - Finish Line
